VIII.iv.4.A.11.e
.
Processing Hospitalization Rates for SMC(t)
When inputting a decision awarding entitlement to SMC (t),
use the SMC calculator in the
Job Aids
webpage to determine the highest rate(s) of SMC
enter the calculated rates into the VBMS-R SMC PARAGRAPH and SMC CODES screens, and
place the following notation in the free text
Codesheet
SPECIAL NOTATION box:
SMC(t) = (r)(2)
.
Notes
:
If a Veteran is entitled to a higher rate than SMC (l), but less than SMC (r)(2), the appropriate level of SMC should be determined
without
accounting for an elevation to SMC (t).  This action will generate the correct hospitalization code.
Reduction for hospitalization will be made to the rate equal to SMC (s) in cases where there is no underlying SMC entitlement other than to A&A.  Otherwise, the hospitalization rate will be paid according to underlying entitlement.
Reference
:  For more information on reduction of SMC during hospitalization, see
38 CFR 3.552
.
